title: Living habits

Smoking 1 ~ 2 packs / day
Smoke 20 or less a day
Sleep more than 10 hours or less than 5 hours a day
Fat
Correct standing / sitting posture

title: Mental, psychological state

Optimistic

title: Occupational status

title: Genetic factors
